T.query: select sh.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid, sp.businessentityid from salesorderheader sh join salesorderdetail sod on sh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid join salesperson sp on sh.salespersonid = sp.businessentityid

F.query: select sh.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid, sp.businessentityid from salesorderheader sh join salesorderdetail sod on sh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid left join salesperson sp on sh.salespersonid = sp.businessentityid
